import React, { useState } from 'react' import { AuthConsumer } from '../helper/AuthContext' import MyModal from '../components/MyModal' function Home() { const [userContact, setUserContact] = useState(undefined) const getUserContact = (userId) => { const users = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('users')) users.forEach((user) => { console.log(user.uuid, userId) if (user.uuid === userId) { setUserContact({ profile: user.contact.profile, name: user.contact.name, email: user.contact.email, phone: user.contact.number, }) } }) } return (
{({ activeUserId, logout }) => ( <>
Contact List
# First Name Last Name Username
1 Mark Otto @mdo
2 Jacob Thornton @fat
3 Larry the Bird @twitter
)} {' '}
) } export default Home
